mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT Fusion_pair, CONCAT(H_chr,':',H_position) AS Gene5_Junction, CONCAT(T_chr,':',T_position) AS Gene3_Junction, Exon_breakpoint AS Breakpoint_Type, Cancertype AS Cancer_Type, BarcodeID AS TCGA_Sample_Id, Frame, Chr_info AS Chromosome_Information, Source, CONCAT(ChimerKB,' ',ChimerPub) AS Supported, '' AS Detail FROM ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver1 WHERE (Source = 'FusionScan' OR Source = 'TopHat-Fusion' OR Source = 'PRADA' OR Source = 'ChimerDB2_SRA' OR Source = 'ChiTaRs' ) AND (Kinase != 'NA' OR Oncogene != 'NA' OR Tumor_suppressor != 'NA' OR Receptor != 'NA' ) AND (Chr_info = 'Inter-chr' OR Chr_info = 'Intra-chr' OR Chr_info = 'NA') AND (ChimerKB != 'NA' OR ChimerPub != 'NA') limit 1000;

SELECT DISTINCT Fusion_pair,CONCAT(H_chr,':',H_position) AS Gene5_Junction, CONCAT(T_chr,':',T_position) AS Gene3_Junction,Exon_breakpoint AS Breakpoint_Type, Cancertype AS Cancer_Type,BarcodeID AS TCGA_Sample_Id,Frame,Chr_info AS Chromosome_Information, Source,CONCAT(ChimerKB,' ',ChimerPub) AS Supported, '' AS Detail FROM ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver1 WHERE (Source = 'FusionScan' OR Source = 'TopHat-Fusion' OR Source = 'PRADA' OR Source = 'ChimerDB2_SRA' OR Source = 'ChiTaRs' ) AND (Kinase != 'NA' OR Oncogene != 'NA' OR Tumor_suppressor != 'NA' OR Receptor != 'NA' ) AND (Chr_info = 'Inter-chr' OR Chr_info = 'Intra-chr' OR Chr_info = 'NA') AND (ChimerKB != 'NA' OR ChimerPub != 'NA') limit ${strtn},${lntn};

select distinct Fusion_pair , 5Gene_Junction as gene5Junc , 3Gene_Junction as gene3Junc , Breakpoint_Type , Cancertype , BarcodeID , if(Frame = "NA","",Frame) as Frame , Chr_info , Source , ChimerKB , ChimerPub, concat(ChimerKB, "_", ChimerPub) as supported from ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver5 where 1=1
and H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}" or T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and Fusion_pair = "${dataForSearchType}"
and (H_locus LIKE "${dataForSearchType}" OR T_locus LIKE "${dataForSearchType}")
and webSource in (${queryForWebSource}) and Cancertype in (${queryForCancerType}) and (${queryForSource}) and (${queryForFilterByFunc}) and Chr_info in (${queryForFusType}) and (${queryForSupInfo}) ORDER BY ${sortedKeyword} ${sortType} limit ${strtn},${lntn}

select distinct count( * ) as allNum from ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver5 where 1=1
and H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}" or T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and Fusion_pair = "${dataForSearchType}"
and (H_locus LIKE "${dataForSearchType}%" or T_locus LIKE "${dataForSearchType}%")
and webSource in (${queryForWebSource}) and Cancertype in (${queryForCancerType}) and (${queryForSource}) and (${queryForFilterByFunc}) and Chr_info in (${queryForFusType}) and (${queryForSupInfo})

SELECT * FROM Gene_Info a LEFT JOIN GRCh37_GFF b ON b.Gene_ID=a.gene_id AND b.no BETWEEN a.gff_start AND a.gff_end AND b.type IN ('gene', 'exon', 'mRNA', 'transcript') WHERE a.symbol=#{symbol} ORDER BY b.no

SELECT * FROM GRCH37_GFF a, ( SELECT gene_id, gff_start, gff_end FROM Gene_Info a WHERE symbol=#{symbol} ) b WHERE a.Gene_ID=b.gene_id AND a.no BETWEEN b.gff_start AND b.gff_end AND a.type IN ('gene', 'exon', 'mRNA', 'transcript') ORDER BY a.no

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS elementIndex , a.* FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM GRCh37_GFF a, ( SELECT max(no) no FROM Gene_Info a LEFT JOIN GRCh37_GFF b ON b.Gene_ID=a.gene_id AND b.no BETWEEN a.gff_start AND a.gff_end AND b.type IN ('exon') WHERE a.symbol=#{symbol} GROUP BY start, end ) b WHERE a.no=b.no ) a, (SELECT @rownum:=0) b
